text:
Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view north from the Lacombe Ave, bridge.

July 29, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Lacombe Avenue Bridge.

text:
Pugsley's Creek (Bronx): A view of the mouth of the creek where it merges with Westchester Creek; both falling into the East River. The view is southward across the salt meadows from a point on Lacombe Ave.

July 29, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - [A view of the mouth of the creek where it merges with Westchester Creek - Lacombe Avenue.]
